comment._content: More about the artist, Cyrus LeRoy Baldridge (1889-1977): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyrus_Leroy_Baldridge

comment.author: 37403879@N05
comment._content: You know what I love about this? The fact that the woman has a child. Being a strong woman is not going out there to try to do a man's job or be exactly like a man. The strength of women is in their power to bear and raise LIFE--we pass everything important on and preserve our values for coming generations, through raising children. It is the most important job in the nation. Yep.
